title: Large-Scale Environmental Problem-Solving Project Utilizing Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and comprehension of ecological concepts
context.additional_context: Students perform individual and collaborative tasks using mobile devices, with an AI-driven recommendation system providing personalized missions based on learning progress

learning_goals: Learners will explain causes and effects of climate change with ≥80% accuracy
Learners will practice ≥3 sustainable lifestyle habits through simulation tasks provided by gamification platforms
Learners will propose ≥2 creative ideas for solving environmental problems while performing collaborative missions
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
